content: learn to make a beautiful fade shawl using tunisian crochet it is a simple 1 row repeat pattern very easy to learn and make multiple yarn options made using either #4 weight or #3 weight yarn there are 3 fade sequences you can choose from depending on the yarn you are using the pattern can be used with either worsted/aran #4 weight yarn or #3 weight yarn you will use 2 contrasting yarns that can either be solid and/or color changing use #simpletunisianfadeshawl when sharing on social media video tutorial pattern comes with link to the video tutorial with step by step instructions and discussion of multiple yarn choices also instructions on easy way to weave in tails as you go ********************************************* share your version of this project with #simpletunisianfadeshawl follow me on instagram https //www instagram com/light_and_joy_designs/ join my vip facebook group and share your pictures of your version https //www facebook com/groups/letshavefuncrochet facebook page https //www facebook com/lightandjoydesigns pinterest https //www pinterest com/agentsully/ tik tok - @agentsully https //www tiktok com/@agentsully ************************************************************** link to blog post - with all materials and download links coming soon http //lightandjoydesigns com subscribe for free at lightandjoydesigns com to get free alerts of -new free patterns -yarn reviews -giveaways -and much more http //bit ly/crochetmmt this is the 43rd project of the crochet magical mystery tour by light and joy designs #ljdcmmt 1 43 this is a whole year of weekly free quick and easy crochet projects where you will learn new stitches and techniques each week plus monthly giveaways & recognition learn more and join the crochet magical mystery tour http //www lightandjoydesigns com/magical-mystery-tour/ 1 be sure to subscribe and click the notify bell to be alerted of future free patterns reviews tutorials and more all year long drop a comment i d love to hear your thoughts on this pattern thanks for viewing 1 http //www lightandjoydesigns com/magical-mystery-tour/
